xmenu_ui_report_00: Would you like to save your adventure so far?
xmenu_ui_report_03:
Now saving your Pokémon adventure...
Don’t turn off the power.

into\r
its\r
battle form?\c
xmenu_ride_change_message03:
Your party is full! Would you like to move a
Pokémon to your Boxes to make space?\c
xmenu_ride_change_message04:

into\r

xmenu_ride_change_message11:
It’s registered to one of your Battle Teams.
It won’t be able to take part in battles.\c
xmenu_ride_change_message12:
Both your party and your boxes are full, so you
can’t have it change forms right now.\c
xmenu_ride_change_message13:
You’ll be left without any Pokémon that can
battle if you do that!
xmenu_hp_recovery_message02: You don’t have any healing items handy!\c
xmenu_hp_recovery_message03: A Pokémon that’s fainted must be revived first!\c
xmenu_hp_recovery_message04: An Egg doesn’t need any healing!\c
xmenu_hp_recovery_message05:
You’ve run out of items that can be used to
Auto Heal your Pokémon!\c
xmenu_hp_netcontents_off: You can’t use the Poké Portal now.
